```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(gridExtra)
library(WVPlots)
alibrary(ggExtra)

CFB<-read.csv("CFB2019.csv")
```

### Does defense really win championships?
```{r}
CFB<-CFB %>%
  separate(Win.Loss, c("Win", "Loss"), "-") %>%
  mutate(Winpct = as.numeric(Win)/Games,Avg.Rank=(Off.Rank+Def.Rank)/2)

p1 <- CFB %>% ggplot(aes(Winpct,Off.Rank)) +geom_point()+stat_smooth(method = lm)+labs(title = "Win Percentage vs. Offensive Rank")

p2 <- CFB %>% ggplot(aes(Winpct,Def.Rank)) +geom_point()+stat_smooth(method = lm)+labs(title = "Win Percentage vs. Defensive Rank")

plot_grid(p1, p2)

ggMarginal(p1, type="histogram")

ScatterHist(CFB, "Winpct", "Off.Rank",
            smoothmethod="lm",
            title="Win Percentage vs. Offensive Rank")
```

```{r}
CFB %>% separate(Team, c("College Team","NCAA"), " ",extra = "drop", fill = "right")
CFB %>% 
  separate(Team, c("College Team","NCAA")," ",)

CFB %>% 
  separate(Team, c("College Team","NCAA")," ")%>%
  ggplot(aes(x=CFB$NCAA,y=Winpct))+
  geom_bar(stat='identity',fill="blue")+
  ylab("Win Percentage")+xlab("NCAA")+coord_flip()
```
